text: Ndugu zangu, nomambukiza mkulonga vino, nzonzi zenu zimeme mbuli zinogile, na zija zilumbile kugweleligwa nhogolwa, mbuli zimemile kweli, mbuli za kuhishimilwa, zilibule uzenzeleganye, zing'alile, zinogelwa na wanhu, na zili na nhogolwa inogile. Vigelegezeni vinhu vinogile na vilumbile kuhishimilwa.
